AT0007.title: Device Spoofing Tools
AT0007.description: Device spoofing is an important tool relied upon by criminal gangs for large-scale operations. Through device spoofing, criminals can batch-forge new devices or modify device fingerprints to bypass business risk controls.

references.title: Xposed - A framework service that can affect program execution (modify the system) without modifying the APK
Cydia Substrate - A code modification platform that can modify the code of any main process
Frida - A convenient and easy-to-use cross-platform Hook tool
